title: Fire Pit Lounge, Easy Access to Shopping, Free Pet Treats in Office
posting_body: ['Your Journey Begins Here', 'Colton Apartments represent the ultimate expression of Henderson, Nevada’s unique and adventurous spirit.', 'Designed to delight, this apartment community offers a world of simple sophistication, framed with endlessly fascinating views of boundless blue skies and majestic mountains.', 'Nestled at the crossroads of the Sloan Canyon National Conservation Area and Lake Mead, residents enjoy access to the area’s abundant recreational activities like hiking, biking, boating, rock climbing, and horseback riding.', 'Come discover large and pet-friendly one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartment homes.', 'Visualize better living as you relax in the tranquil heated spa, exceed your health goals in the fitness center, and enjoy meals with friends and family as you BBQ in the picnic area.', 'Every apartment home features a complete appliance package, a private balcony or patio, and an in-home washer/dryer.', 'Discover better living at Colton Apartments.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 26', 'OR Text', '26', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 812 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Mounted Microwave', '- Walk-In Closets*', '- Tech Station or Nook*', '- Den or Study*', '- Pantry*', '- Spotlights*', '- Attached Garage*', '- Gas Stove', '- Breakfast Bar*', '- In Home Washer and Dryer', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Spacious Kitchen*', '- Granite Countertops*', '- Garden', 'Tub*', '- Balcony or Patio', '*Amenities may vary and are subject to change at any time', 'Community Amenities', '- Heated Pool', '- Free Pet Treats in Office', '- Business Center', '- Clubhouse', '- Indoor Kitchen', '- Easy Access to Freeways', '- Easy Access to Shopping', '- Covered Parking', '- Fire Pit Lounge', '- Outdoor Kitchen', '- Fitness Center', '- Beautiful Landscaping', '- Cabanas', '- Copy and Fax Services', '- Gated Access', '- Guest Parking', '- Outdoor Pet Stations', '- Outdoor Lounge', '- On-Call Maintenance', '- Outdoor Gaming', '- Picnic Area with BBQ', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets are welcome but limited to two per unit.', 'Please note that residents will be required to pay a $350 initial pet fee, along with a $150 deposit.', 'Additionally, monthly rent increases by $45 for those with pets.', 'Certain breed restrictions may apply.', 'Please see leasing office for details.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Colton Apartments', '320 Conestoga Way, Henderson, NV, 89002', 'nEpjoEWf9']
